B2 used to refer to the first thing in a list: There are two very good reasons why we can't do it. Firstly, we don't have enough money, and secondly, we don't have enough time.
More examplesFewer examplesI want two things from my boss - firstly, a pay rise, and secondly, a longer contract.There are three factors to take into account: firstly cost, secondly time, and thirdly staff.
